statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); user=$(whoami); hostname=$(hostname -s); git_branch=''; if [ -d "$current_dir/.git" ]; then git_branch=$(cd "$current_dir" && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); fi; if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then printf "\033[36m%s@%s\033[0m:\033[32m%s\033[0m [\033[33m%s\033[0m] [%s]" "$user" "$hostname" "$current_dir" "$git_branch" "$model"; else printf "\033[36m%s@%s\033[0m:\033[32m%s\033[0m [%s]" "$user" "$hostname" "$current_dir" "$model"; fi
